title: THE.GUNS.OF.NAVARONE.1961.PAL.DVDR.MULTISUBS[8] -Lindoff
description:
Description
One of the great war movies of all time with an all start 
cast and a gripping plot--based on the Alistair MacLean novel. 
A commando team is sent to a Greek Island to destroy the 
giant guns of World War II Germany which are controlling 
a strategic channel in the Aegean Sea. 
This was a groundbreaker in the Special Effects department too. 
Academy Award Nominations 7 including Best Picture Best 
Director Best (Adapted) Screenplay. Academy Awards Best 
Special Effects.

Special Features
Interactive Menus
